description: Lists internet events that cause performance or availability issues for client locations. Amazon CloudWatch Internet Monitor displays information about recent global health events, called internet events, on a global outages map that is available to all Amazon Web Services customers. You can constrain the list of internet events returned by providing a start time and end time to define a total time frame for events you want to list. Both start time and end time specify the time when an event started. End time is optional. If you don't include it, the default end time is the current time. You can also limit the events returned to a specific status ( ACTIVE or RESOLVED) or type ( PERFORMANCE or AVAILABILITY).

nested_items.name: InternetEvents
nested_items.description: A set of internet events returned for the list operation.

nested_items.name: EventId
nested_items.description: The internally-generated identifier of an internet event.

nested_items.name: EventArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the internet event.

nested_items.name: StartedAt
nested_items.description: The time when an internet event started.

nested_items.name: EndedAt
nested_items.description: The time when an internet event ended. If the event hasn't ended yet, this value is empty.

nested_items.name: ClientLocation
nested_items.description: The impacted location, such as a city, that Amazon Web Services clients access application resources from.

nested_items.name: ASName
nested_items.description: The name of the internet service provider (ISP) or network (ASN).

nested_items.name: ASNumber
nested_items.description: The Autonomous System Number (ASN) of the network at an impacted location.

nested_items.name: Country
nested_items.description: The name of the country where the internet event is located.

nested_items.name: Subdivision
nested_items.description: The subdivision location where the health event is located. The subdivision usually maps to states in most countries (including the United States). For United Kingdom, it maps to a country (England, Scotland, Wales) or province (Northern Ireland).

nested_items.name: Metro
nested_items.description: The metro area where the health event is located.

nested_items.name: City
nested_items.description: The name of the city where the internet event is located.

nested_items.name: Latitude
nested_items.description: The latitude where the internet event is located.

nested_items.name: Longitude
nested_items.description: The longitude where the internet event is located.

nested_items.name: EventStatus
nested_items.description: The status of an internet event.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: The token for the next set of results. You receive this token from a previous call.
